statements: SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases
SELECT disease_name, cases, deaths FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT country, disease_name, date_reported FROM InfectiousDiseases ORDER BY date_reported DESC
SELECT country, SUM(cases) AS total_cases, SUM(deaths) AS total_deaths FROM InfectiousDiseases GROUP BY country
SELECT disease_name, recovery_rate FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE cases > 100 ORDER BY recovery_rate
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE cases > 100 AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT disease_name, country, cases FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE recovery_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY cases DESC;
SELECT country, SUM(cases) AS total_cases, SUM(deaths) AS total_deaths FROM InfectiousDiseases GROUP BY country HAVING total_cases > 5000;
SELECT disease_name, recovery_rate, date_reported FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY recovery_rate ASC;
SELECT AVG(cases) AS average_cases, AVG(deaths) AS average_deaths FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE recovery_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM infections WHERE city='New York';
SELECT patient_name, disease_name FROM infections ORDER BY date_diagnosed DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM outbreak_patterns WHERE country='USA';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM infections GROUP BY disease_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_diagnosed FROM infections WHERE disease_name='COVID-19' AND status='Active';
SELECT * FROM infections WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT patient_name, disease_name, date_diagnosed FROM infections WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) FROM infections GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM infections GROUP BY city ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT country, date_start, date_end FROM outbreak_patterns WHERE total_cases > 1000 ORDER BY date_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases;
SELECT name, cases, country FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE cases > 1000;
SELECT MAX(cases) AS max_cases FROM InfectiousDiseases;
SELECT * FROM OutbreakPatterns ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT disease_id, SUM(cases) AS total_cases FROM RealTimeData GROUP BY disease_id;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY cases DESC;
SELECT name, cases, deaths FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE cases > 1000 AND deaths > 100 ORDER BY update_date;

SELECT rd.location, rd.cases, rd.report_date, ip.location FROM RealTimeData rd INNER JOIN OutbreakPatterns ip ON rd.location = ip.location WHERE rd.cases > 50 AND ip.cases > 100 ORDER BY rd.report_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, cases FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE cases BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY name, cases DESC;
SELECT ip.location, SUM(ip.cases) AS total_cases FROM OutbreakPatterns ip GROUP BY ip.location HAVING total_cases > 2000;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases;
SELECT disease_name, date_reported, location FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases WHERE is_confirmed = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, start_date, affected_area FROM Outbreaks WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM HealthFacilities WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases ORDER BY date_reported DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases GROUP BY disease_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM Outbreaks WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM HealthFacilities WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_cases LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, cases_reported FROM outbreak_location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM health_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, job_title FROM medical_staff WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT symptom_name, severity_level FROM symptoms WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM disease_cases WHERE confirmed_status = true ORDER BY date_reported DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, location, date_reported FROM disease_cases WHERE location = 'New York' AND confirmed_status = true
SELECT location_name, cases_reported, country FROM outbreak_location WHERE cases_reported > 50 ORDER BY cases_reported DESC
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity, available_beds FROM health_facilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY facility_name ASC
SELECT staff_name, job_title, facility_name FROM medical_staff INNER JOIN health_facilities ON medical_staff.facility_id = health_facilities.facility_id
